version_description:
**Major V2.7 Update**

- iPad Pro extended Ultra Quality graphics update improves world map and environment decoration.
- iCloud cross save compatibility with Apple TV
- Improved Sound Engine
- Various Bugfixes

**Major V2.7 Update**

- iPad Pro extended Ultra Quality graphics update improves world map and environment decoration.
- iCloud cross save compatibility with Apple TV
- Improved Sound Engine
- Various Bugfixes

Major Update V2.8

- iPad Pro: Overview of the game world drastically improved. Now you can enjoy the game with more details at a glance, taking extra advantage of the XXL screen.
- Several bug fixes
- Game UI improved on all iPads

Major Update V2.8

- iPad Pro: Overview of the game world drastically improved. Now you can enjoy the game with more details at a glance, taking extra advantage of the XXL screen.
- Several bug fixes
- Game UI improved on all iPads

Major Update V2.9

New ultra quality graphics support for the latest iPhone SE and 9.7-inch iPad Pro.
Both devices now run the game at max setting and at 60fps.

Enjoy the extended world decorations and increased polygon count!

- V

Major Update V2.9

New ultra quality graphics support for the latest iPhone SE and 9.7-inch iPad Pro.
Both devices now run the game at max setting and at 60fps.

Enjoy the extended world decorations and increased polygon count!

- V

Major Update V3.0

Oceanhorn is now taking full advantage of the power of iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus with a variety of additional details in the game.
For iPhone 7 Plus, we have also updated the camera to give a better overview of the game world

Major Update V3.0

Oceanhorn is now taking full advantage of the power of iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus with a variety of additional details in the game.
For iPhone 7 Plus, we have also updated the camera to give a better overview of the game world

Major Maintenance Update:
- Improved graphics performance for all new 2017 hardware.
- Bug fixes

Major Maintenance Update:
- Improved graphics performance for all new 2017 hardware.
- Bug fixes
Fixed some minor issues to improve cutscenes on iPhone X.
Fixed some minor issues to improve cutscenes on iPhone X.
Universal update for improved graphics and performance on new devices (including 2019)
